release.action: Performance improvements particularly for Web Services proxies.
Not caching service proxy in the http session anymore. This was causing outofmemory errors if sessions were not short lived.
Fixed issue 50: Remove systematic final attributes on methods.
Fixed issue 51: Remove static attribute on commons logging logger .
Changing name of this module from "Mainframe to Web Service runtime" to "Mainframe Proxy Runtime".
Fixed Issue 10: Switch HTTP transports from binary/octet-stream to application/octet-stream. Servers still support binary/octet-stream for backward compatibility.
Refactoring using the new Transformers API.
Fixed Issue 12: make code reusable by other modules (Mule and JBoss ESB).
Fixed Issue 6:Give c2wsrt clients access using raw binary rather than LegStarMessage.
Fixed Issue 8: Support Binding to POJO instead of Web Service in c2wsrt. A set of interfaces now abstracts the actual proxy invoker.
Refactored the code so that it is closer to the one used for Jboss ESB using JAX-WS Dispatch API. Ultimately we should be able to reuse a lot of code between the 2 projects.
Removed instance variables which are bad practice in a Servlet.
Documentation update to cross reference the new distribution-zos project.

The central configuration where all new service proxies were to be added in an XML file is gone. Proxies are now servlets with a web.xml that contains all necessary parameters. See the sample provided in legstar-c2wsrt.war. The URL known to mainframe programs is simply the proxy servlet URL.
New sample COBOL program MSNSEARC shows how to call Microsoft search SOAP API.
First release of the mainframe to web service runtime.
